name: Desquared!
description:
Destroy the squares before they reach the finish line! A simple hypercasual game made with Unity.

How to Play

Click the squares to damage them, until they get destroyed. If they reach the end, you lose health. Squares emmiting particles are power-up squares, they leave a star-square behind. Click the star-square to enable a power-up.
